Package pages

Class MainPage

java.lang.Object
pages.MainPage
public class MainPage extends Object
The MainPage class holds the functionality connected with the main page for all users.

    • mainPage

      public static void mainPage()
      The mainPage method gives the opportunity to choose what the user wants to do. If the choice is invalid asks for another. If it is valid redirects to the corresponding page.
